title: Can Bengals stay Hungry? How to Build a Championship team; Most valuable rookie? Crazy Tom Brady factoids
itunes:title: Can Bengals stay Hungry? How to Build a Championship team; Most valuable rookie? Crazy Tom Brady factoids
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Hall of Famer Cris Carter examine how the Cincinnati Bengals should be preparing for the Super Bowl against the Los Angeles Rams. Then they debate which rookie was most valuable his rookie season; Cris shares how the NFL is such a fraternity; and Peter chronicles the Bengals path to the Super Bowl. They finish up with a new game called: "T.B. or B.S." featuring crazy factoids about Tom Brady.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
